fr_reason: This patent focuses on accelerating deep neural network execution specifically by implementing adaptive matrix multiplication, which is a crucial operation in the context of deep learning applications.

tu_competitor: Combines an SIMD VPU with increased flexibility and memory bandwidth requirements, a matrix unit (MXU) with lower flexibility and high computational density, and a low memory-bandwidth cross-lane unit (XU) for certain operations
